title: Episode 635 - Special Guest The Marine Rapper
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest The Marine Rapper to discuss the many issues Joe Biden has, the three try to figure out why the Democrats automatically assume all Black Americans should vote democratic, they discuss why the fear of ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest The Marine Rapper to discuss the many issues Joe Biden has, the three try to figure out why the Democrats automatically assume all Black Americans should vote democratic, they discuss why the fear of police becomes very pervasive in close-knit communities, the 3 recollect The Marine Rapper's song in "Range 15, and Dan wants there to be a WrestleMania Presidential debate: Who ever wins becomes president! 

www.ghostbed.com/drinkinbros

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest The Marine Rapper to discuss the many issues Joe Biden has, the three try to figure out why the Democrats automatically assume all Black Americans should vote democratic, they discuss why the fear of police becomes very pervasive in close-knit communities, the 3 recollect The Marine Rapper's song in "Range 15, and Dan wants there to be a WrestleMania Presidential debate: Who ever wins becomes president!
